title: Why do high level players smurf in Bronze?
body:
why the truck do we have to get high level players in bronze ruining games for everyone, I can think of a few reasons.

1. They got boosted and are really bad in their top tier ?
2. They cant get a win in their top tier and need to feel good by beating a bronze level player?
3. They are just bad people who enjoy smashing lower level players?

Any more reasons??

replies.body:
4. to duo with their friends at a lower league since you can only duo with people within 1 league of you
5. to practice a new champion
6. to boost a friend out of whatever league they are smurfing in for whatever reason.
7. to laugh at mad bronzies
8. to learn how low elo works so that they can coach friends
9. to rank up a new account
10. same reason people play bot games, to snowball and have fun destroying a game
Because they want to carry for their bad friends. Which is also bad.
